item.title: [Python] Make each PowerPoint page into an image file with Python
item.description: This is the only function I am happy with when making training materials. Converts image files in PowerPoint page units. Opening PowerPoint and choosing File->Export->Change File Type, automates the same thing in Python. I used PowerPoint to operate PowerPoint using com, and I didn’t like the file name of slide1.PNG, so I converted it to slide1.png. The file name of PowerPoint to read and the output destination are specified at the beginning of the file.
